#summary Add a new capability resource.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||AddCapability||String||Yes||
||`OwnerID`||UUID of the owner of this capability||UUID||Yes||
||`Resource`||URL of the protected resource this capability maps to||Uri||Yes||
||`Expiration`||UTC timestamp when this capability will expire||UTC Timestamp||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=AddCapability
&OwnerID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
&Resource=http%3A%2F%2Fexample.com%2Fprotected_resource%2F
&Expiration=1264451975
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a CapabilityID was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`CapabilityID`||UUID of the newly created capability||UUID||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Mon, 25 Jan 2010 20:43:35 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 45
Content-Type: application/json

Success:

{
    "Success":"true",
    "ID":"c006082b-80eb-4d17-90ff-224412c574ea"
}
}}}

Failure:

{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message:"Expiration date is in the past"
}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * A new capability was created, or an existing capability was updated with a new expiration
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
